nodes.text: Urlos Du'Ram was a male Human pirate of the Death's Claw pirate gang who resided on Taris. Around 3643 BBY, he was killed by a Republic-affiliated individual.

Urlos Du'Ram appears in the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an Elite boss on the planet Taris. He is not directly involved in any quests, however he can be killed by any Republic-affiliated character as part of the achievement "Liberator of Taris". This articles assumes 100% game completion, which means Du'Ram was killed.
